entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
